guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"emipu","text":"If cell viability for any sample is \u003c50%, avoid using that sample in the suspension mix.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dhdk2","text":"If cell viability is between 50-70%, you may try to enrich for viable cells by centrifuging at lower speed (100 g). It may improve the viability to \u003e75%, the cells can then be mixed with the other samples.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
